abstract: MSNBC has found ratings success and savings with its current approach.
snippet: MSNBC has found ratings success and savings with its current approach.
lead_paragraph: MSNBC’s on-again, off-again interest in forming a new 10 p.m. program seems to be off again, given the cable news channel’s recent win against CNN in the time slot.

headline.main: With Reruns Doing Well, MSNBC Puts Off Its 10 O’Clock Plan
